description:
When he learns that the power of the well will cost the servant her memories, Jinbei goes into the well after her. She was prepared to lose her memories but Jinbei persuades her not to.  When she leaves, Sanada Yukimura is there...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kawashita Yakusoku wa Zetsubou no Naka no Kibou
The Promise Is Hope Within Despair
交わした約束は絶望の中の希望
